get_all_files_within_folder¶

ucf.get_all_files_within_folder(path, negative_condition)[source]¶

Catalogue all files within a folder according to negative condition

Parameters

  • path (str) -- Path to the folder.

  • negative_condition (str) -- Exact text contained with the name of the files, which is utilized to identify files which will not be catalogued.

Returns

Names of all files within folder except file names designated in negative_condition parameter.

Return type

list
